title: Can't redeem codes?
body:
Hello, I found out about the dreadknight garen promotion and I just got the code, but when I try to redeem it it says "There was a problem redeeming your store items, please try again..."
What can I do?

replies.body: Poros got you fam. Sometimes those codes don't work correctly but we can get those added for ya too. Be sure to refresh your client if you don't see him at first.
